name: Star Smove - Territorial Expansion
description:
The Earth is endangered in 2046! Power stones in the universe are called for to repair the fragile ecosystem and energize the old planet.

However, lost in the universe unfortunately, now your spaceship needs to blaze a trail in spite of the fierce forays of meteors. Luckily, snatch those Power stones, and then you can expand your territory and win more for the mission.

But do keep an eye on those annoying meteors. Once your spaceship crashes on them, your territory will get smaller and you’ll finally die of collision. So, keep vigilant and calm!

Rules are simple: in order to expand your territory, you should swipe to control your spaceship and collect as many Power stones as possible, while dodging the meteors.
Go ahead and try it!
